title: What are some examples of really well designed websites from the early 2000s? - Quora
tags: History of the World Wide Web

response.answer_text: In the early 00's one of the leading designers was Joshua Davis, primarily known for his site Praystation:|P|R|A|Y|S|T|A|T|I|O|N| It was really groundbreaking -- especially in terms of Flash animation. k10k was a big design influence in this time as well:KALIBER10000 ... thanks for making me feel old :)
